item.title: Sim 2: Effective Potential
item.description: Plot the effective potential for the two body force simulation.

item.title: Sim 1: Two Body Central Force
item.description: Day one of building 99 simulations. We’ll reduce a problem that at first requires 6 parameters with coupling, to a problem with just 3 (or 2, depending on how you look at it) by exploiting the symmetry. “Nature does not care how we describe her”.
